name: Aussenposten
description:
Base building game in space with artificial life simulation.

  • Build an utopian colony
  • 18 different buildings.
  • Three different resources.
  • Manage dozens of colonists.
  • Expand to create a thriving economy.
  • Detailed colonist artificial life simulation.
  • Encounter mysterious alien creatures.
  • Build up to three bases with exchange/teleport system.
  • Multiple maps (coming soon)

If you have any suggestions or found a bug, write me an email simon@nekapuzer.at.

You can also visit our homepage aussenposten.gamejs.org or give feedback in this thread on freegamedev.net
